Key Match Events: Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a solo home run in the first inning
David Peralta extended the lead with a two-run homer in the second inning
The Dodgers loaded the bases in the second inning but were unable to score due to an inning-ending double play
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres hit a total of six homers in the game
The Dodgers allowed the most home runs in a playoff game in franchise history
Others: The game was marked by bad blood between the two teams and their fan bases
The Dodgers now look to avoid deja vu from their 2022 NLDS series loss to San Diego
